pair.title: Add a virtual radar
pair.instructions: Select the source of the information. OpenSky is free, but provides limited and sometimes inaccurate information. For other services you need an account

tab1.title: Instructions
tab1.addDeviceInstructions: Add a new device via the Homey tab `Devices`. Radar finds all aircraft in range of your Homey location. Tracker will track a single aircraft. Select the data source. OpenSky is free, but provides limited and sometimes inaccurate information.
